oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The people of |han=kass'o's country do not kill a white springbok, because they believe that the other springbok will disappear. 1) p.7993v: |han=kass'o heard this from his maternal grandfather (Tsatsi); see Notes on rock painting copy no. 5, no. 6. and no. 7 , 2) This story is found in Book VIII-22.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The slaying of a white springbok will cause the other springbok to disappear
